Job Title: Security Officer

Location: Sacramento, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Information Technology, Management, Other

Description:
Work Shift:

Grave

Pay Type:

Hourly

Hourly Rate (if applicable):

$23.55

Targeted Base Salary Range (if applicable):

N/A

JOB OVERVIEW:

Effectively performs duties necessary to provide security for company assets and personnel, support production and business objectives. Coordinate’s emergency response and crisis management and verifies access control for all personnel and vehicle.

RESPONSIBILITIES:

Performs access control of all personnel and vehicles entering Blue Diamond property, processing employees, contractors, vendors, and visitors in accordance with prescribed guidelines.Processes and records entry/exit of all trucks, monitoring product shipment and deliveries. Monitors telephones and radio communications, CCTV’s, fire alarm and security notifications systems, providing emergency response dispatch and coordination of security personnel.Implements checklists, Standard Operating Procedures and Crisis Management Plans, coordinating response of safety, maintenance, and key personnel, to include local emergency response agencies (EMS, PD, and Fire) during emergency situations.Drives a marked security patrol vehicle.Proactively conducts vehicle and foot patrols of Blue Diamond properties and facilities ensuring the safety and security of personnel, property, and product, remaining alert for theft, intrusion, unsecure and unsafe conditions.Responds to fire, intrusion, and duress alarms, taking appropriate measure to restore situations. Performs fire control and preventive inspections, routine security checks, parking enforcement duties and traffic control. Provides customer service and assistance to employees and company departments as needed.Prepares and completes security reports and documentation for routine and emergency incidents. Maintains records, files, and processes single documents.Participates in special security events and details. Performs additional duties and responsibilities as required or assigned.Works overtime as necessary as assigned and directed by Management.Maintains individual Guard Card certifications and responsibilities. This job description reflects management’s assignment of essential functions; it does not prescribe or restrict the tasks that may be assigned.\High School Diploma or GED3 years of security officer, military, or law enforcement experienceRequired to possess a valid drivers’ license and clean DMV print out.Must have good communication skills and the ability to interface with drivers, customers and others that come to Blue Diamond.Musts be able to interact with all levels of internal and external customers, contactors, and employees, resulting in positive working relationships.Basic computer and CCTV skills are required.Must be able to read, interpret and articulate company policies and instructions.Must be knowledgeable and recognize crisis management alarms and situations (fire, intrusion, machinery malfunction), provide direction and perform follow-up actions.

Additional Requirements

Must be available for any and all shifts.Current BSIS Guard Card certification required.Required to wear of a security uniform.Required to Carry and use a two-way radio.Required to use a cellular phone and other types of phones.Basic computer skills required.

WHY BLUE DIAMOND?

In addition to working at the world’s largest, state-of-the-art almond manufacturer, we offer a safe and collaborative team environment, with numerous opportunities for free training and career advancement. Check out the BDG Benefits, Health & Wellness Guide HERE .

Grow your career. Partner with us. We Are the Almond People!

Ready to get started? Apply now!

Blue Diamond Growers (BDG) is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. BDG provides equal employment opportunities to all qualified applicants without regard to race, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, color, age, religion, protected veteran or disability status, or genetic information. BDG also complies with all provisions of the U.S. Government's Executive Order 11246 dated September 24, 1965 and the rules, regulations and relevant orders of the Secretary of Labor.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
